indications.text: fluocinolone acetonide 0.01 % topical oil ( body oil ) indicated topical treatment : atopic dermatitis adults moderate severe atopic dermatitis pediatric patients 3 months age older

contraindications.text: fluocinolone acetonide 0.01 % topical oil oral , ophthalmic , intravaginal . ( 2.1 ) face intertriginous areas . ( 2.1 ) adult patients : apply affected areas 3 times daily . ( 2.2 ) pediatric patients : moisten skin apply affected areas twice daily 4 weeks . ( 2.3 )

warningsAndPrecautions: fluocinolone acetonide 0.01 % topical oil ( body oil ) supplied bottles containing 4 fluid ounces ( ndc 65162-704-86 ) . storage : keep tightlyclosed . store upright 20° 25°c ( 68° 77°f ) ; excursions permitted 15° 30°c ( 59° 86°f ) [ usp controlled room temperature ] .
name: FLUOCINOLONE ACETONIDE
indications_original:
Fluocinolone Acetonide 0.01% Topical Oil (Body Oil) is indicated for the topical treatment of: 
                  
                     atopic dermatitis in adults
                     moderate to severe atopic dermatitis in pediatric patients 3 months of age and older
contraindications_original: Fluocinolone acetonide 0.01% topical oil is not for oral, ophthalmic, or intravaginal use. ( 2.1 ) Do not use on face or intertriginous areas. ( 2.1 ) Adult patients : Apply to affected areas 3 times daily. ( 2.2 ) Pediatric patients : Moisten skin and apply to affected areas twice daily for up to 4 weeks. ( 2.3 )
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
Fluocinolone Acetonide 0.01% Topical Oil (Body Oil) is supplied in bottles containing 4 fluid ounces (NDC 65162-704-86).
                  Storage: Keep tightlyclosed. Store upright at 20° to 25°C (68° to 77°F); excursions permitted to 15° to 30°C (59° to 86°F) [see USP Controlled Room Temperature].
